item.content:encoded:
Employee Anniversary 15 Years – Blue Swirls Card

Hot Review! Employee Anniversary 15 Years – Blue Swirls Card – Anniversary Cards Popular Employee Anniversary 15 Years – Blue Swirls Card help you save during this period Employee Anniversary 15 Years – Blue Swirls Card You can order itThis is an eye catching 15 years business employee anniversary card featuring a blue swirly pattern with silver sparkle effect outlines and star bursts.

In the lower section of the design is a cream colored text box on which is written: ‘Happy Anniversary’ in a beautifully flowing script font and in a matching blue and sparkle effect to the swirly pattern.

Above the ‘Happy Anniversary’ text is a cream colored text box with a blue and cream decorative outline and the text: ’15 YEARS’ in a plain bold font with a silver sparkle effect overlay and a surrounding star burst which also has a silver sparkle effect overlay.

This design is also available in red and cream.

PLEASE NOTE that all glitter and sparkle effects were created digitally.

© Natalie Kinnear Cards

This card can also be purchased from my online store with Greeting Card Universe who have printing partners in both the US and the UK:
http://www.greetingcarduniverse.com/business/employee-relations/employee-anniversary/years-of-service-specific/greeting-card-1422008?gcu=47771017551 Price:$4.42
